description: Defines values for setting the textJustify property of the TextLayoutFormat class. Default value is INTER_WORD, meaning that extra space in justification is added to the space characters. DISTRIBUTE specifies that extra space is added both to space characters and between individual letters. Use these values only when setting justificationRule to SPACE.

members.description: Specifies that justification is to add space both to space characters and between individual letters.
Specifies that justification is to add space to space characters.
